race.name: Hobgoblin
race.age: Hobgoblins mature at the same rate as humans, and have lifespans similar in length to theirs.
race.height: Hobgoblins are between 5 and 6 feet tall.

feature.name: Darkvision
feature.shortDescription: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You canâ€™t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

feature.name: Saving Face
feature.shortDescription: Hobgoblins are careful not to show weakness in front of their allies, for fear of losing status. If you miss with an attack roll or fail an ability check or a saving throw, you can gain a bonus to the roll equal to the number of allies you can see within 30 feet of you (maximum bonus +5). Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.
